price: Dijo [Salomón a la abubilla]: "Veremos si has dicho la verdad o eres de los que mienten.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
